pow_mul_right:
@[simp]
theorem pow_mul_right (a : A) (n : ℕ) : mul_right R a ^ n = mul_right R (a ^ n) :=
  by
  simp only [mul_right, ← algebra.coe_lmul_eq_mul]
  exact linear_map.coe_injective (((mul_right R a).coe_pow n).symm ▸ mul_right_iterate a n)
#align pow_mul_right pow_mul_right
pow_mul_left:
@[simp]
theorem pow_mul_left (a : A) (n : ℕ) : mul_left R a ^ n = mul_left R (a ^ n) := by
  simpa only [mul_left, ← algebra.coe_lmul_eq_mul] using ((algebra.lmul R A).map_pow a n).symm
#align pow_mul_left pow_mul_left
mul_right_zero_eq_zero:
@[simp]
theorem mul_right_zero_eq_zero : mul_right R (0 : A) = 0 :=
  (mul R A).flip.map_zero
#align mul_right_zero_eq_zero mul_right_zero_eq_zero
mul_right_to_add_monoid_hom:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+ » -/
@[simp]
theorem mul_right_to_add_monoid_hom (a : A) : (mul_right R a : «expr →+ » A A) = AddMonoidHom.mulRight a :=
  rfl
#align mul_right_to_add_monoid_hom mul_right_to_add_monoid_hom
mul_right_one:
@[simp]
theorem mul_right_one : mul_right R (1 : A) = linear_map.id :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [linear_map.id_coe, mul_one, id.def, mul_right_apply]
#align mul_right_one mul_right_one
mul_right_mul:
@[simp]
theorem mul_right_mul (a b : A) : mul_right R (a * b) = (mul_right R b).comp (mul_right R a) :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [mul_right_apply, comp_apply, mul_assoc]
#align mul_right_mul mul_right_mul
mul_right_injective:
#print mul_right_injective /-
theorem mul_right_injective [no_zero_divisors A] {x : A} (hx : x ≠ 0) : function.injective (mul_right R x) :=
  by
  letI : nontrivial A := ⟨⟨x, 0, hx⟩⟩
  letI := NoZeroDivisors.to_isDomain A
  exact mul_left_injective₀ hx
#align mul_right_injective mul_right_injective
-/
mul_right_eq_zero_iff:
@[simp]
theorem mul_right_eq_zero_iff (a : A) : mul_right R a = 0 ↔ a = 0 :=
  by
  constructor <;> intro h
  · rw [← one_mul a, ← mul_right_apply a 1, h, linear_map.zero_apply]
  · rw [h]
    exact mul_right_zero_eq_zero
#align mul_right_eq_zero_iff mul_right_eq_zero_iff
mul_right_apply:
@[simp]
theorem mul_right_apply (a b : A) : mul_right R a b = b * a :=
  rfl
#align mul_right_apply mul_right_apply
mul_left_zero_eq_zero:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left_zero_eq_zero : mul_left R (0 : A) = 0 :=
  (mul R A).map_zero
#align mul_left_zero_eq_zero mul_left_zero_eq_zero

@[simp]
theorem mul_left_to_add_monoid_hom (a : A) : (mul_left R a : «expr →+ » A A) = AddMonoidHom.mulLeft a :=
  rfl
#align mul_left_to_add_monoid_hom mul_left_to_add_monoid_hom
mul_left_right_apply:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left_right_apply (a b x : A) : mul_left_right R (a, b) x = a * x * b :=
  rfl
#align mul_left_right_apply mul_left_right_apply
mul_left_one:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left_one : mul_left R (1 : A) = linear_map.id :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [linear_map.id_coe, one_mul, id.def, mul_left_apply]
#align mul_left_one mul_left_one
mul_left_mul:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left_mul (a b : A) : mul_left R (a * b) = (mul_left R a).comp (mul_left R b) :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [mul_left_apply, comp_apply, mul_assoc]
#align mul_left_mul mul_left_mul
mul_left_injective:
#print mul_left_injective /-
theorem mul_left_injective [no_zero_divisors A] {x : A} (hx : x ≠ 0) : function.injective (mul_left R x) :=
  by
  letI : nontrivial A := ⟨⟨x, 0, hx⟩⟩
  letI := NoZeroDivisors.to_isDomain A
  exact mul_right_injective₀ hx
#align mul_left_injective mul_left_injective
-/
mul_left_eq_zero_iff:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left_eq_zero_iff (a : A) : mul_left R a = 0 ↔ a = 0 :=
  by
  constructor <;> intro h
  · rw [← mul_one a, ← mul_left_apply a 1, h, linear_map.zero_apply]
  · rw [h]
    exact mul_left_zero_eq_zero
#align mul_left_eq_zero_iff mul_left_eq_zero_iff
mul_left_apply:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left_apply (a b : A) : mul_left R a b = a * b :=
  rfl
#align mul_left_apply mul_left_apply
mul_injective:
theorem mul_injective [no_zero_divisors A] {x : A} (hx : x ≠ 0) : function.injective (mul R A x) :=
  by
  letI : nontrivial A := ⟨⟨x, 0, hx⟩⟩
  letI := NoZeroDivisors.to_isDomain A
  exact mul_right_injective₀ hx
#align mul_injective mul_injective
mul_apply':
@[simp]
theorem mul_apply' (a b : A) : mul R A a b = a * b :=
  rfl
#align mul_apply' mul_apply'
mul'_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem mul'_apply {a b : A} : mul' R A («expr ⊗ₜ » a b) = a * b :=
  rfl
#align mul'_apply mul'_apply
commute_mul_left_right:
theorem commute_mul_left_right (a b : A) : Commute (mul_left R a) (mul_right R b) :=
  by
  ext c
  exact (mul_assoc a c b).symm
#align commute_mul_left_right commute_mul_left_right
coe_lmul_eq_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
@[simp]
theorem _root_.algebra.coe_lmul_eq_mul : «expr⇑ » (algebra.lmul R A) = mul R A :=
  rfl
#align algebra.coe_lmul_eq_mul algebra.coe_lmul_eq_mul
